akn:subsection.akn:heading: Opportunity of Secretary to dispute withdrawal

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Opportunity of Secretary to dispute withdrawal Before withdrawing the security property from foreclosure under subparagraph (B) or (C) of subsection (a)(1), the foreclosure commissioner shall afford the Secretary a reasonable opportunity to demonstrate why the security property should not be so withdrawn.

(d) Notice of cancellation The foreclosure commissioner shall file a notice of cancellation in the same place and manner provided for filing the notice of default and foreclosure sale in section 3758 of this title.
